title: The Dumbest Ability You Can Come Up With?
body:
**R - Neuroshock:**
"Targeted champion's ping rises by 1000 for 2 seconds."

Could imagine that on some kind of psychic mage/support kind of guy.

The concept is probably unbalancable but I find the idea of it hilarious.

Passive: 'You can't kill what's already dead'
"Champion doesn't want the enemy team to get kills off him, so he kills himself whenever his health reaches 30%"

I have actually tested this twice with morde to see if I could kill myself with health costs (they were both during ascension games when I was already very low) and I found that one time it laft me alive with 1 health, and the other time I died and the kill was credited to the enemy who had attacked me a few seconds ago, but didnt seem to hit me with anything or have any DOT on me.
Apparantly you used to be able to kill yourself with health costs but they removed it to allow for a more risky play style. You sure you weren't under a dot or death's dance maybe?

Some kinda ability that creates a wall of some sort that blocks skill shots, ranged auto attacks and some targetted skills... but you can walk and attack through it.  It'll be on like a 20 second cooldown so it's up once a fight and we'll put it on a hyper-aggressive, hyper-scaling, crazy mobile champ without mana to make sure it's always there to ruin your day and drive you insane.

A support?   Naw dawg, it's going on a hyper carry... having a defensive support with a defensive ability that strong would make too much sense.  Let's put it on some crazy anime stereotype too so the weeaboos pick him into every game.  Yeah... that'll do.

Q (Wanna see your enemy burn?): Cast it on an enemy to make him lose 10 LP. If he is at 0 LP, he gets degrated to the next lower division. If he is bronze V 0 LP, then he gets a negative LP value.
Cost: 10 Mana
Cooldown: 1 Seconds

It wouldn´t affect your LP or the game itself. But you would just spam it and laugh.

Edit: It´s now global and you can cast it by clicking on the champion icon while pressing tab.

I can legit see this a massive zoning tool.


Imagine if this is an ultimate on a 90 sec cooldown and has 500 cast range.

People would be too afraid to approach you cause they will lose their LP!
